name: Long-term code maintenance with Ole Bulbuk & Sandor Szücs (Go Time #264)
summary: Ole Bulbuk &amp; Sandor Szücs join Natalie to discuss the ins &amp; outs of long-term code maintenance. What does it take to maintain a codebase for a decade or more? How do you plan for that? What about inheriting a codebase for the long term? Oh, and (how) can AI help?
